bilingual.source: The irp handles the interrupt requests from the hardware.
bilingual.target: 中断请求处理程序处理来自硬件的中断请求。

bilingual.source: The device generates an interrupt on the trailing edge.
bilingual.target: 该设备在下降沿时会产生一个中断。
中断处理程序始终在中断上下文中运行。

bilingual.source: In addition, it can send interrupt data, and receive interrupt.
bilingual.target: 此外，还可发送中断数据、接收中断数据。

bilingual.source: A table containing interrupt vectors and indexed by interrupt type.
bilingual.target: 一个表格,包含由中断类型决定的中断向量和索引.

bilingual.source: The address of an interrupt service routine.
bilingual.target: 中断服务程序所在的地址。

bilingual.source: Don't interrupt or cut the other person off.
bilingual.target: 不要打断或中断对方的话。

bilingual.source: A unique umber a ociated with each interrupt.
bilingual.target: 和每一个中断相关联的唯一数字.
其他某个线程中断线程T。

yingyinNormal.zh: 来吧。你胆敢打断这场审判？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry, sir, but I have to interrupt.
You don't interrupt a meeting with the Secretary of State.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不能打断我和国务卿的会面。

yingyinNormal.en: Interrupt me in the middle of my eulogy. You're supposed to be dead.
yingyinNormal.zh: 打断我的悼词。你现在应该是死的状态。

yingyinNormal.en: Good evening, sir. Sorry to interrupt your supper, but we have some news.
yingyinNormal.zh: 晚上好，长官，抱歉打扰了您的晚餐，但我们有新消息。

yingyinNormal.en: Sorry to interrupt. Thank you for your enthusiasm. Let's not jinx those polls.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉打断一下，感谢大家的热情，别再荼毒我们的民调了。

yingyinNormal.en: Max, did he give you these fruit roll-ups, or did you take them? Don't interrupt.
yingyinNormal.zh: 麦克斯，水果卷是他给你的还是你自己抢的？别插嘴。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't mean to interrupt. I just thought I'd drop by to see the terrifying faces joining my program.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我无意打断上课，我只是顺道来看看本课程的新惊吓面孔。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm lucky if I get 5 minutes before you interrupt. So now I have to sit alone in a cave for thirty years?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你能安静五分钟让我说完就好了。所以我现在要找个山洞呆上三十年吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Excuse me. Sorry to interrupt, but Mr. Archibald is awake. He was asking for you. Thank you. You're welcome.
yingyinNormal.zh: 打扰一下，抱歉打断你们了，阿齐布尔德先生醒了，我想见你。谢谢。不客气。

yingyinNormal.en: Sorry to interrupt. You two enjoy your date. Here's a dollar for your troubles. Get yourself some Sour Patch Kids.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉打扰你们了，祝两位约会愉快。给你一块钱就当我给你添麻烦了，自己去买点酸软糖吃吧。

yingyinNormal.en: May I help you? Oh, sorry didn't mean to interrupt. It's just such a beautiful space; do you do a lot of weddings here?
yingyinNormal.zh: 有什么事吗？抱歉打断你，这里很美，经常举办婚礼吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry. I didn't mean to interrupt things. He isn't a good swimmer, and it's a little too soon for him to be out here unsupervised.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对不起 我不是故意要打断你。他游泳技术还不行, 在没有允许的情况下就到那去我想对他来说还有点为时过早。

yingyinNormal.en: I think there will be an adjustment period after it takes over, but eventually... Wait, I'm sorry to interrupt. What do you mean by "takes over"?
yingyinNormal.zh: 待人工智能接管后，人类将会有个调整期，但最终...慢着，抱歉插句话，你说「接管」是什么意思？

yingyinNormal.en: What? Hello, Penny. I realize you're currently at the mercy of your primitive biological urges, but as you have an entire lifetime of poor decisions ahead of you, may I interrupt this one?
yingyinNormal.zh: 干嘛？你好，佩妮。我明白你现在正完全被最原始的野性冲动所控制，可是，反正你这辈子还会有无数错误的决定， 我能不能打断这一个？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 中止；中断；打断；打破…连续性；打岔；遮断；阻碍

sense_info_list.en: stop the continuous progress of an activity or process

examination_example.sentence: It is not simply that one is <highlight>interrupted</highlight>; it is that one is actually inclined to interruption.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这不仅仅是一个人被打断；而是一个人实际上倾向于被打断。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The right level of background noise may <highlight>interrupt</highlight> our normal patterns of thinking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 适当水平的背景噪音可能会干扰我们正常的思维模式。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: stop the continuous progress of an activity or process

examination_example.sentence: Be patient and never trying to <highlight>interrupt</highlight> (打断) them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 保持耐心，永远不要试图打断他们。

examination_example.sentence: Also, it's rude to <highlight>interrupt</highlight> Japanese people while they are talking to you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，在日本人和你说话时打断他们是不礼貌的。

examination_example.sentence: Never <highlight>interrupt</highlight> them when they are talking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他们谈话时，千万不要打断他们。
